external_references.source_name: Joint Cybersecurity Advisory AA23-129A Snake Malware May 2023
external_references.description: FBI et al. (2023, May 9). Hunting Russian Intelligence “Snake” Malware. Retrieved June 8, 2023.

objects.description: [Uroburos](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0022) can intercept the first client to server packet in the 3-way TCP handshake to determine if the packet contains the correct unique value for a specific [Uroburos](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0022) implant. If the value does not match, the packet and the rest of the TCP session are passed to the legitimate listening application.(Citation: Joint Cybersecurity Advisory AA23-129A Snake Malware May 2023)
